TopicTitle: What is your favourite ingame music?

Articles.Content: Mine is the ''Elevator'' in the VAB, and I absolutely don't like the one that goes ''a b c d b c a'' because every time it plays the kraken comes and breaks everything in my saves

Of the stock music my favourite is probably ‘Frost Waltz’, but I use the Soundtrack Editor mod to add more music to the game- the composer of some of the KSP music has a huge library of music available to download, and I recently found out that Astronomer’s Visual Pack has a set of music to go with it including from ‘The Martian’, ‘Interstellar’ and M83- Outro (used in the KSP2 trailer).

If I could add any music at all to the game, I’d go with both Saturn and Uranus by Holst, some music from ‘First Man’ and the launch scene music from ‘Apollo 13’. And then sneak in the debris scene from ‘Gravity’ to make EVAs properly terrifying.

I don't know them by name.

I like the jaunty VAB music, and absolutely love the title music.
I like all of it, I like the Mission Control music the best, followed by the VAB music.

The one from  the cars, passing by.

Or mine, made louder.

Or (the preferred one), the silence of space.

All of the music is top notch in KSP. But I'm a huge fan of the R&D Facility track. 

It's so poignant. Sometimes I crank it up in my headphones and slow-mo walk into the office. Nobody knows why.

But I know... I know...

Edited December 16, 2020 by Chequers

On 11/19/2020 at 12:41 AM, Starhelperdude said:

I absolutely don't like the one that goes ''a b c d b c a'' because every time it plays the kraken comes and breaks everything in my saves

Kind of like the song in minecraft that sets zombies on fire, backwards

8 hours ago, Chequers said:

All of the music is top notch in KSP. But I'm a huge fan of the R&D Facility track. 

It's so poignant. Sometimes I crank it up in my headphones and slow-mo walk into the office. Nobody knows why.

But I know... I know...

Agree, the music of KSP is top notch.  A lot of games, I turn off the music after a while. But not KSP,  KSP music creates the mood even after a thousand hours. Fav for me is "Space Music track 3"

 

Edited December 16, 2020 by fragtzack
